mapper.select: select from TFS_FILE_INFO ORDER by FILE_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TFS_FILE_INFO ORDER by FILE_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(FILE_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(FILE_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TFS_FILE_INFO

select case when max(FILE_VERSION) is null then 0 else max(FILE_VERSION) end from TFS_FILE_INFO where FILE_ID in (select REF_FILE_ID from TFS_FILE_REF where REF_OBJ_ID=#{objId} and REF_OBJ_TYPE=#{objName})
select case when max(FILE_CODE) is null then 0 else max(FILE_CODE) end from TFS_FILE_INFO where FILE_ID in (select REF_FILE_ID from TFS_FILE_REF where REF_OBJ_ID=#{objId})
select from TFS_FILE_INFO where FILE_ID in (select REF_FILE_ID from TFS_FILE_REF where REF_OBJ_ID=#{objId} and REF_OBJ_TYPE=#{objName}) and FILE_VERSION=#{version}
select from TFS_FILE_INFO where FILE_ID in (select REF_FILE_ID from TFS_FILE_REF where REF_OBJ_ID=#{objId} and REF_OBJ_TYPE=#{objName}) and FILE_VERSION=#{version}
select from TFS_FILE_INFO where FILE_ID in (select REF_FILE_ID from TFS_FILE_REF where REF_OBJ_ID=#{objId}) and FILE_CATEGORY like #{category} order by FILE_ORDER_NUM asc

select from TFS_FILE_INFO where FILE_ID in (select REF_FILE_ID from TFS_FILE_REF where REF_OBJ_ID=#{objId}) and FILE_CATEGORY like #{category} and FILE_EXTENSION in ('jpg','png','gif','bmp','webp') order by FILE_ORDER_NUM asc
